line.comment: * We first need to initialize marines that have not been created by Mayhem. We also update marines location in case of an exchange in space.
* Purge the list in case some marines don't exist anymore.
* Don't list if the marine isn't onboard of a player ship.

sval.val: We first need to initialize marines that have not been created by Mayhem. We also update marines location in case of an exchange in space.
Purge the list in case some marines don't exist anymore.
Don't list if the marine isn't onboard of a player ship.
